Why is this torrent so small?

The main file is downloadable directly from the Sony servers. All PSN links are permanent and have not changed in 6 years. 

No one-click hosters or captchas or ads or logins.. just a full speed direct link. Use a download manager for best speeds.

You should be able to max out your connection, taking the load off seeders and letting Sony take care of it. 8) Just make sure to seed this torrent (which contains the needed fix)!

-------------------------------------------------------------------



How to install large (4GB+) PKG files:

1. copy .pkg onto a NTFS USB stick or HDD and plug into PS3

2. in multiman, click " toggle FAT32 / NTFS " under PFS DRIVER (on left menu next to settings)

3. click File Manager / mmOS

4. find the .pkg on the NTFS drive and double-click it (press X twice)

5. it will copy the pkg and exit to XMB where it is ready to be installed (in a bubble)

6. enjoy!

DLC Content:

ATOMIC BLIMP
- With access to this iconic feature of the Los Santos skyline, players can take control of 

the most leisurely aircraft in the Los Santos skies.

ADDITIONAL WEAPONS
- Your local Ammu-Nation will always be stocked with a pair of special firearms at no 

additional cost that also have their own unique customization options, skins and attachments 

- the .50 Caliber Pistol and the Bullpup Shotgun.
- You will also have access to the Hammer, which acts as a brutal melee weapon.

SPECIAL ABILITY BOOST
- Michael, Franklin and Trevor have their own unique Special Ability, which can be activated 

once each of them fills up the Special Ability bar based on various actions.
- Michael is an expert marksman, Franklin is a skilled driver with sharp reflexes, Trevor is 

a sociopath with a short fuse and rage.
- With the boost, the Special Ability bar will generate 25% faster.

STUNT PLANE TRIALS
- Take a wild flight in Los Santos and Blaine County at breakneck speeds in the Stunt Plane 

Trials.
- In five thrilling and unique challenges, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll zip through mountains, deserts, oceans, and 

cities as you navigate through a maze of checkpoints.
- Completing each Challenge Trial will improve the piloting skill of your character.

BONUS OUTFITS, TATTOOS AND MORE
- Michael, Franklin and Trevor will receive a special 20% discount in shops, along with 

access to special items either in their personal wardrobes or from stores.
- Each character will receive 1 outfit each, one additional article of clothing (shirt, 

hoodie and jacket) each and a tattoo.
